name: Dungeon of the Broken
description:
"You made the decision you would regret for all eternity, trapped in your own private hell to suffer with no chance of escaping. At least you thought so."

Dungeon of the Broken is a game about a man who decided to end his own life, now trapped in a hellish place for eternity. Now with a lifetime opportunity, this man can scape his eternal torment.

Explore the dungeon, find the three soul shards, and get to the exit door.

Controls:

  • WASD - Walk
  • QE - Turn the character
  • Left Mouse Button - Interact with the dungeon or attack monsters
  • Hand Icon - Activate interaction mode
  • Sword Icon - Activate attack mode
  • Map Icon or M key- Map and Character status

Developers:

  • Eduardo de Azevedo dos Santos (Gerudoking) - Programmer
  • André Gustavo Batista (Mizore) - Artist
